meanings.sent1: The mammographic images showed the doctor detailed pictures of the patient's breast.
meanings.sent2: The hospital had a mammographic machine to help with breast cancer screenings.
meanings.sent3: The mammographic equipment decided to take a break after a long day of scanning.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a mammographic film, capturing every detail with precision.
meanings.sent5: The importance of mammographic technology cannot be overstated in early detection.

meanings.sent1: The mammographic procedure was painless and quick for the patient.
meanings.sent2: Doctors rely on mammographic tests to detect any abnormalities in the breast tissue.
meanings.sent3: The mammographic device beeped happily when it completed the scan.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as clear as a mammographic result showing no signs of cancer.
meanings.sent5: The advancements in mammographic technology have revolutionized breast cancer diagnosis.
